Registration fees (both regular and student) include:

  • Reception at the Oslo Town Hall,
  • Excursion to the Oslo Folkemuseum,
  • Conference dinner at the Folkemuseum, and
  • Coffee breaks and lunches for four days.

Note: You do not need to sign-up for XING (Events) in order to register (you can safely ignore all sign-up entries and messages). Your browser might raise a notification about a missing SSL certificate, but the connection is indeed secure.

More participants thanks to online event management solutions from XING Events.
